com.inepex.hyperconnector.serialization

Class BinarySerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inepex.hyperconnector.serialization.BinarySerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HyperSerializer

    public class BinarySerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements HyperSerializer
    Binary serializer based on Thrift 0.6.0. serialization methods and classes, slightly modified to suit HyperConnector's needs.
    Author:
    Gabor Dicso

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getValue()
      Returns the serialized value of the values written into the serializer as a byte array.
      java.lang.String getValueAsNonNullCharString()
      Returns the return value of getValue() as a specially encoded string that does not contain '\0' characters.
      java.lang.String getValueAsString()
      Returns the return value of getValue() as a string.

      • getValue

        public byte[] getValue()

        Returns the serialized value of the values written into the serializer as a byte array.
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface HyperSerializer

      • setValue

        public void setValue(byte[] value)
        Description copied from interface: HyperSerializer
        Sets the serialized value as a byte array. Values can be read from the serializer afterwards in the order they were written into it.
        Specified by:
        setValue in interface HyperSerializer
